Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2013 07:29PM - edited Aug 31, 2013 07:37PM by MaddiesMama75 Thank you ladies so much! My mother was diagnosed at 38 and passed away at 41, so that adds another layer. Yes, the mammo tech is the voice that terrified me most. As far as the size of the mass, it was she who said, "It's not the biggest I've seen but definitely not the smallest." That isn't helpful either. Thank you ladies again for the support. I will keep all of you warriors in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Mass Confirmed, Waiting for Biopsy Results & Terrified MaddiesMama75 Beesie

Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2013 12:07PM MaddiesMama75 wrote: So ladies, the biopsy came back positive. :( Invasive ductal carcinoma is all I know at this point. Thanks again for getting me through the weekend.
